Long Description: The base plugin for Stroopwafel CFW. Required for all other plugins.
Patches IOSU to allow booting with isfshax installed. This plugin is required for ISFShax.
Loader for Aroma - Loads Aroma or Tiramisu on boot.
Use SD card for Wii U Games - Simulates a USB device with a partition on the SD card, so Wii U games can be installed to it

Use Partition on USB in place of a SD card - Allows the use of partitioned USB Devices with the Wii U. The first FAT32 partition will be used as SD and the last NTFS partition will be Wii U (WFS) formatted to use for Wii U games.
Use partitioned USB devices with the Wii U without SD card emulation. Allows using the last NTFS partition as a Wii U (WFS) formatted partition for Wii U games.
Add support for more Revisions (A, B and C) of the AX88772 series. It also looks for some more PIDs/VIDs, since some OEMs like Apple changed them.
Do not not turn on the tablet / gamepad on boot
Enables more verbose syslog output on the debug port. Only meant for developers with defuse, as it can impact performance.
